services.shortDetails: Our goal is to provide a patient-centered medical home for all patients
services.details: When you need treatment for minor injuries and illnesses, but the doctor is not available, Medicenter immediate care services have you covered. Our immediate care locations combine easy-to-access services with our well-known standards for delivering the best care.
